alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 30 at 3:14PM EDT until May 03 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Greene and Ulster Counties in east central New York. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Greene; Western Ulster
